2. server to support connectivity integrationi with network simulator such as amarisoft which is based on websocket  or TCP/IP connection
3. include the scope of the target device, apart from mobile phone, it could also be iot modems such as Quectel RG500 eu. it supports AT command, integration with QXDM tool
